name: Paw Paw Death Festival
storyline:
【Purrgatorium Watcher】(board game, 4 min/ a play)
As the judgement of the purgatory between heaven and hell, prevent the escape and invasion of 12 sinners, and become the guardian god in the world [TurnBase * RogueLite * Card * TowerDefence]

【Pawnishment Card deck】(1,008 cards)
Unlock various punishment cards using tickets and edit the title freely. Create your original damage card deck by registering your favorites!

【Cosmic Pawâtissier (City build)】
Become a creative pastry chef in the heavenly realm and feed mankind with delicious and odd civilized sweets. Alter the history of the region in a chaotic way!

【(Cat/Dog) character customization】
100 types * many colors for an infinite number of original Edit. dress up and go on the job!
summary: A simple job to execute sinners in a surrealistic way! Three casual party modes for free thinking and creative dark humor + with a great ridiculous comment function to get the audience together on your live streaming.

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
videos.title: How to make a BIG WINNING? - on ✨Paw Paw Death Festival
